snippet.title: Genopanic Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore a mysteriously abandoned space station, collect adorably terrifying GMO critters and reveal the secrets of the genetic experiments.

You can add the game to your wishlist by the link in the pinned comment.

Thank you for watching!
